page.title: 14AT SCHOOL PART-2
page.content: We have breaks from 10:35-10:50 and 2:30-2:45 and our dinner time is from 12:00-1:15 . Projects and monitors , pupils who help around school can go straight into the canteen , but the rest of the year has to queue up,and 6 boys and 6 girls are let in alternetly. At 1:15 another bell rings , and we go to afternoon registration before starting lessons. After the break and another lesson , we go back again to registration at 3:55 and the end-of-school bell rings at 4:00 when everyone goes home.
